text: The RNeasy Mini Kit ( Qiagen ) was used to isolate total RNA from cells .
For cDNA synthesis , 1 microg of total RNA was reverse transcribed using TaqMan ( R ) Reverse Transcription Reagents ( Applied Biosystems ) .

qPCR was performed using TaqMan ( R ) Gene Expression 20X primers for <extra_id_0> Serpinb2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> SerpinB2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Mm00440905_m1 ) , <extra_id_0> Cebpb <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Mm00843434_s1 ) and <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Mm00607939_s1 ) ( Applied Biosystems ) .
